item.description:
UNH Durham Solar Fest 2012
Boulder Field, UNH, Durham, NH from 11 a.m. to sunset

Join the UNH community for a fun-filled, environmentally-friendly festival that involves live music and various booths from local vendors. The entire event will be run completely on solar energy provided by a bus with solar panels attached to it. Solar Fest is organized by the Student Environmental Action Coalition on campus.

Free & open to the public.

www.facebook.com/UNHSolarfest
item.how_to_find_us: just look for a blue and white vehicle, I'll be there
item.name: UNH Durham Solar Fest 2012
